biography: New York City born, Pittsburgh raised Actor/Producer/Director is a former World-Class Athlete having won a Bronze Medal for the United States in the 1985 World Games, London and named All-World All-Star in 1987. Starting in Pittsburgh Theater, then films and television followed. Currently living in New York City as Writer/Producer/Director for TV and Stage.  - IMDb Mini Biography By: Chris Frederick
name: Christopher Frederick
place_of_birth: New York, New York City, USA
